723 
 
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
ARCHEAOLOGY IBADAN  
     
combined with:  
(i) Geology         
(ii) Geography        
(iii) Zoology         
(iv) Botany          
  
ARCHEAOLOGY   
(SINGLE HONOUR)  
IBADAN   
  
Two (2) 'A' level passes 
chosen from  
Geography Chemistry,  
Geology, Physics,  
Mathematics, Zoology 
and Botany or Biology.  
  
Five (5) or six (6) SSC credit 
passes at one (1) or two (2) 
sittings including English 
Language, Mathematics 
and other relevant 
subjects. Mathematics and 
two (2) other relevant 
subjects.  
  
Any three (3) 
relevant Science 
subject.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY AND UTME  
(i) IBADAN requires  
(a) for Geology option the three (3) Science subjects to include 
Physics and Mathematics.  
(b) for Geography option to include Geography.  
(c) for Zoology or Botany option to include Biology/Botany/Zoology 
and Mathematics.  
(ii) IBADAN does not accept NCE and ND/HND.  
BIOLOGY  
ABUJA  
ADSU  
AL-QALAM        
ANCHOR-UNI  
ARTHUR-JARVIS  
AUGUSTINE  
BABCOCK  
BAYERO  
BAZE  
BINGHAM       
CHRISLAND  
CLIFFORD  
COAL-CITY  
COVENANT      
CROWN-HILL  
 CRUTECH      
EBSU         
(i) Two (2) 'A'  level 
passes from 
Chemistry, Biology, 
Botany/Zoology. 
(ii) NCE merit  
accepted.  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes to 
include English Language, 
Biology, Chemistry and 
Mathematics/Physics.  
  
Biology, Chemistry 
and Physics or 
Mathematics.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) MINNA accepts Physics. It also accepts NCE credit, ND/HND 
lower credit plus the UTME requirements into 200 and 300 
levels respectively.   
(ii) LAGOS requires Biology but does not accept NCE.  
(iii) EBSU accept NCE credit, ND/HND lower credit plus the 
UTME requirements into 200 level.   
(iv) UNIKINGS, AJAYI and CRUTECH - Same as in Microbiology.  
(v) KUST accepts ND/NCE or relevant qualification upper 
credit/merit in Biology, Health Science/ Zoology or 
Botany.  
(vi) AL-HIKMAH accepts NCE passes.  
(vii) CUAB accepts ND in relevant programmes.  
(viii) UMYUK requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry, and any of 
Biology/Agricultural Science or Geography or Computer 
Studies at not more than two (2) sittings.  
(ix) FUTA expects applicants to possess in addition to (a) above 
‘A’ level or equivalent in two (2) of the following subjects:   
 Biology/Agricultural  Science,  Chemistry  and  
Physics/Mathematics.  ND upper credit from a recognized 
institution in Science Laboratory Technology, Science
